name: MeteorDestroyer
description:
Game made for olcCodeJam2019 by Herlebauld. Made with Processing. Contains a lot of annoying bugs.

Instructions: Try to have as many meteors before time runs out. Click to meteors to break them apart. They will merge if they collide. They will get bigger and faster as time goes on. Try to keep them apart and small. Thanks for checking out my game :)
